Package edu.uw.medhas.mhealthsecurityframework.acl.service

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PrivilegeService
    This interface contains methods to create a Privilege, delete a Privilege(and delete corresponding resource and operation) and check for authorization (if a particular role can perform an operation on a resource).
    RoleService
    This interface contains methods to create a Role and delete a Role.
    UserService
    This interface contains methods to create a User and delete a User.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AclServiceFactory
    This class is the ACL service Factory class and it creates the database and the root user, creates operations and assigns various privileges to the root user.
